channel.title: Dark bow
channel.description: how can i make it so the dark bow trains range instead of strengh my source is epicscape v1 =D

item.title: Dark bow
item.dc:creator: @cricket1 cricket :)
item.description:
@cricket1 wrote:

[quote=“gr1ndlewald, post:3, topic:257726”]i have inserted this into my client.java

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827) {
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 5;
UseBow = true;
}

but im not sure what i haveto edit in here:

                                if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156
                                        && specialAmount >= 50) {
                                    ProjectileSpec(380, absY, absX, offsetY,
                                            offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY,
                                            EnemyX);
                                    calculateSpecial();
                                    darkbow();
                                    usingSpecial = false;
                                    specialDamage = 0;
                                    specialDamage2 = 0;
                                }[/quote]

you might want to change the playerWeapon ID on the special attack to what ever the bows ID is on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

useBow = true;

Although you will need to change your special attack around after you change it.
